inclusion.criterion: Established diagnosis of H SS or S-beta thalassemia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of at least one vaso-occlusive pain event in the 12 months prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Regular compliance with comprehensive medical care
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: In a steady disease state and not in the midst of any acute complication due to SCD at study entry
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Liver dysfunction (i.e., SGPT level greater than or equal to two times the normal limit and albumin level less than or equal to 3.2 g/dL)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Kidney dysfunction ( i.e., creatinine level greater than or equal to 1.2 mg/dL for children and greater than or equal to 1.4 mg/dL for adults)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and has experienced severe pain in the past two weeks. He is currently afebrile with normal blood pressure.
